title: My Man Godfrey
description: Vintage paperback of the famous, irresistibly funny story of the the fabulous Bullock family of New York's high society and the butler they found on the city dump. Socially conscious screwball comedy contrasts the wisdom of the poor to the frivolousness of the affluent. A mysterious butler survives his tenure with a mad, millionaire household while teaching them all valuable lessons.The cover features a photo from the movie with June Allyson and David Niven (the remake of the William Powell/Carole Lombard picture).
author: Eric Hatch
